posts.text:
In the Netherlands we have car spotters.  people who take photos of nice cars they see in the streets and post them online.  
Is there anything like that in Iceland but than for 4x4 off road cars??
I would love to see the 4x4 cars online,  the ones that drive around. I am sure there are many special project cars driving around.
oh Finally !!!!  soo happy to find this thanks a lot!!!! looking for something like this for years
"carspotting_iceland" on instagram is showing alot of cars every week. Nice to follow.
